featured.text: The donkey was so much weighed down by the wet sand that he could hardly get out of the stream.

definition.zh_def: 流動的水或其他液體，通常在自然環境中形成的細長水道。
definition.en_def: A continuous flow of water or other liquid, typically in a narrow channel in a natural environment.
definition.example: The children played by the stream, skipping stones across the water.
